word: It should be written on the conscience as with a pen of iron upon a rock, that no man can achieve true success while violating the eternal principles of right. There must be a cleansing of the institutions similar to Christ's cleansing of the temple of old. "It is written," saith the Lord. "My house shall be called a house of prayer, but ye have made it a den of thieves." There are in our institutions today, transactions similar to those that took place in the temple court in Christ's time; and all heaven is looking on. . . .
